speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: So the Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan and I don't know if you know -- you see the big caravan coming in?
politifact_statement: The Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan.
verified_claim: The Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan of illegal aliens into our country. And they want to sign them up for free health care, free welfare, free education, and for the right to vote.
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump falsely says Democrats invite migrant caravans

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: But caravan after caravan is forming unvetted, illegal aliens trying to flood into our country on your dollar, over whelming your schools, depleting your resources, and endangering your community.
politifact_statement: The Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan.
verified_claim: The Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan of illegal aliens into our country. And they want to sign them up for free health care, free welfare, free education, and for the right to vote.
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump falsely says Democrats invite migrant caravans

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Nearly 100 percent of heroin in the United States enters though the southern border, along with roughly 90 percent of cocaine, the majority of meth and a substantial portion of the ultra lethal fentanyl killing a youth drug, fentanyl -- the worst.
politifact_statement: Nearly 100 percent of heroin in the United States enters through the southern border.
verified_claim: Heroin .. pours across our southern borders.
verified_claim_article_title: Trump says heroin pours across the southern border

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: They want to take away your good health care, and essentially use socialism to turn America into Venezuela and Democrats want to totally open the borders.

sentence: We gave them the largest pay raise they've had in more than a decade.
